title: Derwent runs down to the sea
creator_credit: Mobil Oil Australia, Tasfilm Productions, Linda Taylor and Don Anderson
brief_description: Shows a canoe trip along the River Derwent from its source in the highlands at Lake St Clair in Tasmania. Explains the river’s importance in supplying water for agriculture, transport and power.
creator_credit_for_label: Mobil Oil Australia, Tasfilm Productions, Linda Taylor and Don Anderson
